verses.verse: And He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them in <S%G3850>parables:<s%> "A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> a <S%G5418>wall<s%> <S%G4060>around<s%> it, and <S%G3736>dug<s%> a <S%G5276>vat<s%> <S%G5276>under<s%> the <S%G5276>wine<s%> <S%G5276>press,<s%> and <S%G3618>built<s%> a <S%G4444>tower,<s%> and <S%G1554>rented<s%> it out to vine-growers and <S%G589>went<s%> on a <S%G589>journey.<s%>

"And at the [harvest] <S%G2540>time<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G1401>slave<s%> to the vine-growers, in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> [some] of the <S%G2590>produce<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> from the vine-growers.
"And they <S%G2983>took<s%> him, and <S%G1194>beat<s%> him, and <S%G649>sent<s%> him <S%G649>away<s%> empty-handed.

"And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> them <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G1401>slave,<s%> and they <S%G2775>wounded<s%> him in the <S%G2775>head,<s%> and <S%G718>treated<s%> him <S%G818>shamefully.<s%>

"And he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G243>another,<s%> and that <S%G2548>one<s%> they <S%G615>killed;<s%> and [so with] <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>others,<s%> <S%G1194>beating<s%> <S%G3739>some,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> and <S%G615>killing<s%> <S%G3739>others.<s%> <S%G1161><s%>

"He <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> [to send,] a <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>son;<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> him <S%G2078>last<s%> [of all] to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'They will <S%G1788>respect<s%> my <S%G5207>son.<s%>'

"But <S%G1565>those<s%> vine-growers <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G3778>'This<s%> is the <S%G2818>heir;<s%> <S%G1205>come,<s%> let us <S%G615>kill<s%> him, and the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> will be <S%G1473>ours!<s%>'
"And they <S%G2983>took<s%> him, and <S%G615>killed<s%> him, and <S%G1544>threw<s%> him out of the <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>

<S%G5101>"What<s%> will the <S%G2962>owner<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%>? He will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G622>destroy<s%> the vine-growers, and will <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> to <S%G243>others.<s%>

"Have you not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture:<s%> 'The <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>rejected,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> the <S%G2776>chief<s%> <S%G1137>corner<s%> [stone];
<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> about from the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> And it is <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> in our <S%G3788>eyes<s%>'?"

And they were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G2902>seize<s%> Him; and [yet] they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude;<s%> for they <S%G1097>understood<s%> that He <S%G3004>spoke<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> them. And [so] they <S%G863>left<s%> Him, and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away.<s%>
And they <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> to Him, in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G64>trap<s%> Him in a <S%G3056>statement.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> that You are <S%G227>truthful,<s%> and <S%G3199>defer<s%> to <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one;<s%> for You are not <S%G991>partial<s%> <S%G4383><s%> to <S%G444>any,<s%> but <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G225>truth.<s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G1325>pay<s%> a poll-tax to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> not?

"Shall we <S%G1325>pay,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> shall we not <S%G1325>pay<s%>?" But He, <S%G3609>knowing<s%> their <S%G5272>hypocrisy,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G3985>testing<s%> Me? <S%G5342>Bring<s%> Me a <S%G1220>denarius<s%> to <S%G3708>look<s%> at."

And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> [one.] And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Whose<s%> <S%G1504>likeness<s%> and <S%G1923>inscription<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Caesar's."

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G591>"Render<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> the things that are Caesar's, and to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are God's." And they were <S%G7059>amazed<s%> at Him.

And [some] <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G3748>(who<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>) <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him, and [began] <S%G1905>questioning<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> for us that <S%G1437>if<s%> a man's <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> and <S%G2641>leaves<s%> <S%G2641>behind<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G863>leaves<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5043>child,<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> should <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G1817>raise<s%> up <S%G4690>offspring<s%> to his <S%G80>brother.<s%>
"There were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G80>brothers;<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4690>offspring.<s%>

"And the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>one<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> her, and <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G2641>behind<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4690>offspring;<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5615>likewise;<s%>
and [so] <S%G3588>all<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4690>offspring.<s%> <S%G2078>Last<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

"In the <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> one's <S%G1135>wife<s%> will she be? For <S%G3588>all<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> her as <S%G1135>wife.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to them, "Is <S%G3778>this<s%> not the <S%G1223>reason<s%> you are <S%G4105>mistaken,<s%> that you do not <S%G3609>understand<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

"For <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G450>rise<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> they <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> are <S%G7031>given<s%> in <S%G7031>marriage,<s%> but are <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

"But <S%G4012>regarding<s%> the <S%G3754>fact<s%> that the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G1453>again,<s%> have you not <S%G314>read<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> in the [passage about the burning] <S%G942>bush,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'I am the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob<s%>'?
"He is not the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> but of the <S%G2198>living;<s%> you are <S%G4183>greatly<s%> <S%G4105>mistaken.<s%>"

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> them <S%G4802>arguing,<s%> and <S%G3708>recognizing<s%> that He had <S%G611>answered<s%> them <S%G2573>well,<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> Him, <S%G4169>"What<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> is the <S%G4413>foremost<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%>?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "The <S%G4413>foremost<s%> is, <S%G191>'Hear,<s%> O <S%G2474>Israel!<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> our <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

and you shall <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G1271>mind,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2479>strength.<s%>'

"The <S%G1208>second<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> 'You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>' There is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> than <S%G3778>these.<s%>"

And the <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2573>"Right,<s%> <S%G1320>Teacher,<s%> You have <S%G1909>truly<s%> <S%G225><s%> <S%G3004>stated<s%> that He is <S%G1520>One;<s%> and there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G243>one<s%> <S%G243>else<s%> <S%G4133>besides<s%> Him;

and to <S%G25>love<s%> Him with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4907>understanding<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2479>strength,<s%> and to <S%G25>love<s%> one's <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G1438>himself,<s%> is <S%G4053>much<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3646>burnt<s%> <S%G3646>offerings<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices.<s%> "

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that he had <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3562>intelligently,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You are not <S%G3112>far<s%> from the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>" And after that, <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> would <S%G5111>venture<s%> to <S%G1905>ask<s%> Him <S%G3765>any<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1905>questions.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> [began] to <S%G3004>say,<s%> as He <S%G1321>taught<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> [is it that] the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G7035>David<s%>?

<S%G7035>"David<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2521>"Sit<s%> at My <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2193>Until<s%> I <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G4771>Thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G5270>beneath<s%> Thy <S%G4228>feet.<s%>'"

" <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3004>calls<s%> Him <S%G2962>'Lord<s%>'; and [so] in <S%G4159>what<s%> <S%G4159>sense<s%> is He his <S%G5207>son<s%>?" And the <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G2234>enjoyed<s%> <S%G191>listening<s%> to Him.

And in His <S%G1322>teaching<s%> He was <S%G3004>saying:<s%> <S%G991>"Beware<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> who <S%G2309>like<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G4043>around<s%> in <S%G4749>long<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> and [like] respectful <S%G783>greetings<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>places,<s%>
and <S%G4410>chief<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G4411>places<s%> of <S%G4411>honor<s%> at <S%G1173>banquets,<s%>

who <S%G2719>devour<s%> widows' <S%G3614>houses,<s%> and for appearance's <S%G4392>sake<s%> <S%G4336>offer<s%> <S%G3117>long<s%> <S%G4336>prayers;<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4053>greater<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation.<s%> "

And He <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G2713>opposite<s%> the <S%G1049>treasury,<s%> and [began] <S%G2334>observing<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> were <S%G906>putting<s%> <S%G5475>money<s%> into the <S%G1049>treasury;<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>people<s%> were <S%G906>putting<s%> in <S%G4183>large<s%> <S%G4183>sums.<s%>

And a <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3016>small<s%> <S%G3016>copper<s%> <S%G3016>coins,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1510>amount<s%> to a <S%G2835>cent.<s%>

And <S%G4341>calling<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to Him, He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> in <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G906>contributors<s%> to the <S%G1049>treasury;<s%>

for they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> in out of their <S%G4052>surplus,<s%> but she, out of her <S%G5304>poverty,<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3745><s%> she <S%G2192>owned,<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> she had to <S%G979>live<s%> on. "
